channel.title: New Server + Laziness = Help
channel.description:
I'm just too lazy to look up old source to add to my new server, so I'm asking for some "snippets" for it. I will be crossing the required snippets out when they are posted. [b] For a Cleaned Czar V5 Server:[/b]
Fully Working Pickpocketing
Dialogue snippet for NPC Lumbridge Guide
Basic Quest Snippet (Get object, deliver object, receive reward)
Open-book-and-read Snippet
MyPosition command (My version of it does not work)
[b]I will be asking for several more later on! [/b]

item.title: New Server + Laziness = Help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

this section is for people to get help on existing issues with their private server, just program the code yourself, or search around for them

Read full topic

item.title: New Server + Laziness = Help
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Not exactly lazy, just wanted to get it done a bit, because I’m doing some support with this one guy, managing another project, and trying to build off of the server on the side… Not total laziness…

Read full topic

item.title: New Server + Laziness = Help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

If you are to lazy to do it why should we?

Read full topic

item.title: New Server + Laziness = Help
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

No, for the open-book-and-read i want to menu function, so when you select “Read Book” from mouse-menu, it will open up an on-screen menu pane that contains the text inputted in the source.

Read full topic

The open book and read… You want an emote?
